title: Design principle
useful_desc: Our users' content always comes first - make sure we're focusing the user's business goals and always be task driven.
usable_desc: All the users can use it without difficulties. The content needs to be clear and easy to find. Functions need to be easily accessed and efficient.
efficiency_desc: We choose to display UI elements only when they are needed, rather than make them available at all times.
consistency_desc: Create familiarity and strengthen intuition by applying the same solution to the same questions can reduce the learning cost.
accessible_desc: All page designs meet accessibility requirements in terms of color contrast, navigation alternatives, and more guidelines based on WCAG 2.0.
collaborative_desc: We provide a wealth of teaching activities and enable teamwork.
responsive_desc: Using an 8-pixel base unit allows components to scale consistently across all display sizes.
